overview:
I’m the Chief Evangelist for ProductNation.in - a platform that i’m trying to build for Software Product Startups in India.

Over 16 years of professional experience in the tech. sector, with focus on the Web, Mobile, Software Products and interactive marketing space.

I am an evangelist for Made-In-India Software Products and contribute actively in building towards a healthy ecosystem. I love new technology and new business ideas in various domains. Interacting and working with people in implementing these ideas and technologies is my passion.

I enjoy spending time with startups.
